channel.title: TiberiaScape - Development Team Needed
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2qcmr74.png[/img]
[center][size=10pt]Ok guys, you might have noticed that this is my 3rd development team thread, i need DECENT coders and DECENT staff members. Im sick of having people who are far too lazy. Im looking for the following people who have this kind of maturity:[/size]
[b]Sensible Serious Understandable Speaks in a proper manner[/b][/center]
Only these 4 things are required.
[b]TiberiaScape Features:[/b]
- Ancients and Lunars perfectly work. - Server support rank/Super Donator/Donator/Owner/Admin/Mod. - Good home area, needs to be changed. - 100% Perfect pking and switching. - Decent Economy. - Tormented demons. - Skrykeworms, or whatever they are called. - Alot of bosses. - Godwars and so much more. - Including minigames. - Decent features for donators and staff. - Lottery System - Loyalty Titles
[b]Available Positions:[/b]
[code]- Forum Manager (1) - Server Coders (2) - Client Developer (1)[/code]
[b]The Jobs:[/b]
[b]Forum Manager[/b]: Needs to update the forums and take care of them, administrator on forums, needs to make decent and new updates for them like i said. Must have Vbulletin/SMF experience atleast, must know how to setup forums via mysql. [b](personally i can do that, but i need someone to handle it)[/b]
[b]Client Developer[/b]: Adds new models/items, must be able to add different things such as bosses, new crowns, interfaces etc..
[b]Server Coders[/b]: This server is project-insanity based, so you must be able to code the following, commands/npc's/adding objects/minigames/etc..
[b]Voting system willl be made and done by me. Highscores and the other things will be done by me and my server coders.[/b]
[b]Application Formats:[/b]
[b]Client Developer:[/b] [code]- Name: - Age: - Java experience: - What can you do: - Why do you want to be the client developer: - Msn Or Skype:[/code]
[b]Forum Manager:[/b] [code]- Name: - Age: - Website experience: - What can you handle?: etc vbulletin/smf.. - What can you code?: etc HTML/PHP/CSS.. - Why do you want to be the forum manager: - Msn Or Skype:[/code]
[b]Server Coder:[/b] [code]- Name: - Age: - Java Experience: - What can you code?: - Why do you want to be the server coder: - Msn Or Skype:[/code]
[b]My Message:[/b] Im hoping that decent people will apply, i really need people to take this seriousely, i just failed 2 development teams 2 in a raw. So im only accepting people who can take this seriousely. I only also want to see people experienced only, i dont want beginners aka noobs who can only code changing player rights of a user -___-
[i][b]SERVER CODERS AND CLIENT DEVELOPERS MUST HAVE DROPBOX![/b][/i]
Im hosting 24/7 on my pc until we can get 15$ to buy a vps :L

item.title: TiberiaScape - Development Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @Hale_M3 Hale M3
item.description:
@Hale_M3 wrote:

  • Name: Umran
  • Age: 17
  • Website experience: Ive handled preety well known Servers forums’
  • What can you handle?: etc vbulletin/smf… Ive had 1 year experience with vBulletin and started smf this year smf is in my comfort zone atm though
  • What can you code?: etc HTML/PHP/CSS… Html; my comfort zone
  • Why do you want to be the forum manager: Well, I like keeping things organised and being a group leader, I can make the forums pretty attractive!
  • Msn Or Skype: Msn; umran_is_the_best@hotmail.com Skype; Umranbro

Read full topic

    Why do you want to be the forum manager:I love informing players threw forums and creating guides for all players to enjoy. And make sure the forums is a safe/fun place for players of all ages.

@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:5, topic:439494”]This doesn’t seem too interesting to be honest. You are asking for people that have proper grammar when you can’t show the influence of having it yourself, doesn’t make sense to me. Good luck with the development nonetheless.[/quote]But I’s gots goods manners James.

kickingjamie:

Ofcourse i owned my own server before, if i didnt i wouldnt be hosting one.

item.title: TiberiaScape - Development Team Needed

item.description:
@Anthony24 wrote:

[center]

[center][size=10pt]Ok guys, you might have noticed that this is my 3rd development team thread, i need DECENT coders and DECENT staff members. Im sick of having people who are far too lazy. Im looking for the following people who have this kind of maturity:[/size]

Sensible
Serious
Understandable
Speaks in a proper manner[/center]

Only these 4 things are required.

TiberiaScape Features:

  • Ancients and Lunars perfectly work.
  • Server support rank/Super Donator/Donator/Owner/Admin/Mod.
  • Good home area, needs to be changed.
  • 100% Perfect pking and switching.
  • Decent Economy.

Forum Manager: Needs to update the forums and take care of them, administrator on forums, needs to make decent and new updates for them like i said. Must have Vbulletin/SMF experience atleast, must know how to setup forums via mysql. (personally i can do that, but i need someone to handle it)

Client Developer: Adds new models/items, must be able to add different things such as bosses, new crowns, interfaces etc…

Server Coders: This server is project-insanity based, so you must be able to code the following, commands/npc’s/adding objects/minigames/etc…

Voting system willl be made and done by me. Highscores and the other things will be done by me and my server coders.
